entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 5:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: E 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
